channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Flash Player Desktop Runtime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Flash Player Desktop Runtime

item.title: CVE-2019-7090|2024-08-04T20:38:33.014Z -- adobe -- flash%20player%20desktop%20runtime
item.description: Flash Player Desktop Runtime versions 32.0.0.114 and earlier, Flash Player for Google Chrome versions 32.0.0.114 and earlier, and Flash Player for Microsoft Edge and Internet Explorer 11 versions 32.0.0.114 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
